testcase.name: reserve_car_as_customer
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page.............................................passed And user login dropdown.....................................................passed And user sends username "customer@bluerentalcars.com".......................passed And user sends password "12345".............................................passed When user clicks on login button............................................passed And user selects a "Ford Fiesta"............................................passed And user enters pick up place "New York"....................................passed And user enters drop off place "New York"...................................passed And user enters pick up date "08/08/2023"...................................passed And user enters pick up time "01:00PM"......................................passed And user enters drop off date "10/10/2023"..................................passed And user enters drop off time "08:00AM".....................................passed Then user clicks on continue reservation....................................passed Then verify complete reservation screen pop up..............................passed And user enters card number "1234123412341234"..............................passed And user enters "Ali Can" on the card.......................................passed And user enters "12/25" and "555"...........................................passed And user checks the agreement...............................................passed And user clicks complete reservation........................................passed Then verify Reservation created successfully pop up.........................passed
